channel.title: Looking For Development Team - ScapeOfLegends
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/7117/logo1mh.png[/img][/CENTER]
I made this topic to search for some developers that might be interested in helping. We are using a PI source (317), and I have a lot of ideas that would make great features, I am just not experienced enough to add them myself. We already have a Vps and domain. If you are interested leave a reply, or add me on my Skype. Feel free to message me on Skype with any questions. Skype: scapeoflegends
[U][B][COLOR=#cabb65]What am I looking for?[/COLOR][/B][/U] - Hoster [1/1] - Server Coders [0/4] - Client Coder [0/1] - Gfx Artist [0/2] - Website Coder [1/2] - Advertiser [0/3]
[U][B][COLOR=#cabb65]What some of my ideas are:[/COLOR][/B][/U] - Dungonering Minigame - Summoning With Following Beasts - Some Bosses: Corporeal Beast, Tornemented Demons etc. - All working Minigames! - Perfect Hybriding [For PK] - 21 Skill All Working 100% - Donor Points System - No player commands, everything has a interface/button.
[U][B][COLOR=#cabb65]Application[/COLOR][/B][/U] How old are you?: Skype name: Position: How long have you coded?: Can you show me some previous work?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?: //*****Other Info Below Here*****\\
Thank you for taking your time to read this. -ScapeOfLegends

I would join. There’s just hardly any info and I don’t like the name :P.

message me on Skype and ill tell you more about it.

item.title: Looking For Development Team - ScapeOfLegends
item.dc:creator: @tgeek430 tgeek430
item.description:
@tgeek430 wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

I made this topic to search for some developers that might be interested in helping.
We are using a PI source (317), and I have a lot of ideas that would make great features, I
am just not experienced enough to add them myself.
We already have a Vps and domain.
If you are interested leave a reply, or add me on my Skype.
Feel free to message me on Skype with any questions.
Skype: scapeoflegends

[COLOR=#cabb65]What am I looking for?[/COLOR]

  • Hoster [1/1]
  • Server Coders [0/4]
  • Client Coder [0/1]
  • Gfx Artist [0/2]
  • Website Coder [1/2]
  • Advertiser [0/3]

[COLOR=#cabb65]What some of my ideas are:[/COLOR]

  • Dungonering Minigame
  • Summoning With Following Beasts
  • Some Bosses: Corporeal Beast, Tornemented Demons etc.
  • All working Minigames!
  • Perfect Hybriding [For PK]
  • 21 Skill All Working 100%
  • Donor Points System
  • No player commands, everything has a interface/button.

[COLOR=#cabb65]Application[/COLOR]
